snippet: The British public has reveled in the success of the home country’s athletes and the smooth operation of the London Games.
abstract: British public has reveled in the success of the home country’s athletes and the smooth operation of the London Games.
lead_paragraph: The British public has reveled in the success of the home country’s athletes and the smooth operation of the London Games.

headline.seo: British Are Unexpectedly Proud and Excited About Olympics
headline.main: For a Fortnight, a Stiff Upper Lip Curls Into a Smile
